channel.title: Spring Creek|Elko County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Spring Creek|Elko County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End NV-228 North at NV-227
item.description: End NV-228 North at NV-227 in Spring Creek. Use NV-227 West for Elko; NV-227 East for Lamoille.

item.title: NV-227 West Approaching Roundabout in Spring Creek
item.description: NV-227 West approaching Licht Parkway and Spring Creek Parkway roundabout in Spring Creek.

item.title: NV-228 South - South Fork Indian Reservation

item.title: NV-227 East at NV-228
item.description: NV-227 east at NV-228 south in Spring Creek.

item.title: NV-227 East Approaching NV-228 South
item.description: NV-227 East Approaching NV-228 South to South Fork Recreation Area and Ruby Lake NWR. Continue east on NV-226 for Lamoille Canyon.

item.title: NV-227 East Approaching NV-228
item.description: NV-227 east approaching NV-228 south to Jiggs. Continue east on NV-227 for Lamoille.

item.title: NV-227 East Approaching NV-228
item.description: NV-227 East approaching NV-228 in Spring Creek. Turn right for NV-228 South/Jiggs Highway; turn left for Spring Valley Parkway.

item.title: NV-227 East - Spring Creek
item.description: Entering Spring Creek - Elevation 5659 Feet on NV-227 East.

item.description: NV-227 South approaching NV-228 in Spring Creek.

item.description: NV-227 West at NV-228 South in Spring Creek.

item.title: NV-227 West at NV-228
item.description: NV-227 West at NV-228 South. Use NV-228 south to Jiggs; continue west for NV-227 to Elko.

item.title: NV-227 West Approaching NV-228
item.description: NV-227 West approaching NV-228 south in Spring Creek.

item.title: NV-227 West - Spring Creek Parkway and Licht Parkway

item.title: Spring Creek - Elevation 5518
item.description: Entering Spring Creek - Elevation 5518 on NV-227 west.
